title: Meesho's festive sale sees record orders on first day, 100% up on year
description: Meesho saw 6.5 crore new customers on its mobile app on the first day of the sale, i.e. September 27. Amazon and Flipkart are also in the middle of their annual sales.
content: Ecommerce major Meesho saw record orders on the first day of its festive season sale, nearly double compared to the figure of last year, and also surpassed daily orders by over three times.
cleaned_content: ecommerce major meesho saw record orders on the first day of its festive season sale nearly double compared to the figure of last year and also surpassed daily orders by over three times
